import React, { useRef } from "react"; import { motion, useScroll, useTransform, useSpring, useInView } from "framer-motion"; import Header from "./Header"; import InteractiveLines from "./InteractiveLines-w"; import Footer from "./Footer"; const Witness: React.FC = () => { const { scrollY } = useScroll(); const scrollX = useTransform(scrollY, [0, 400], [0, -200]); const xSpring = useSpring(scrollX, { stiffness: 100, damping: 30 }); // Add ref for hero section const heroRef = useRef(null); const heroInView = useInView(heroRef, { once: true, amount: 0.3 }); return (
WITNESS

Interactive demo

Project Overview

Witness is a UI/UX design project that explores the intersection of interactive storytelling and user experience. The project focuses on creating immersive digital experiences through innovative interface design.

  • Responsive and adaptive design system

  • Interactive animations and transitions

  • User-centered interaction patterns

Key Features

1

Modern Design Language

Clean, minimalist approach with focus on typography and spacing

2

Motion Design

Thoughtful animations that enhance user experience

3

Accessibility

WCAG compliant design ensuring universal usability
); }; export default Witness;
